author: elena
msg: This might be a temporary solution, in the long run we should see if XML Schema
type information could be made serializable.

author: elena
msg: If namespace feature is off, we should issue an error when validating
against XML Schema. Reorganizing IntegratedConfiguration configurePipeline() so that
the namespace aware scanner is only used in the case namespace feature is turned on.

author: neilg
msg: additional fix for bug 16674; thanks again to Igor Malinin
